"スパルガンの砲身の調達":
"If losing my cookware wasn't bad enough,
my best utensils are ruined too. I take
good care of my things! What ever
happened to quality? So, I've been
thinking... Next time you're in the desert,
get some Spargun barrels for me. They
should be sturdy enough to make my
own, right? I need the best if I'm going to
serve the best!
※Cae de Nv.28+ Sparguns."
